description: Complete 10 workouts in 14 days and unlock a badge!
Complete 5 workouts this week for a reward chest.
Achieve a personal best in any workout.
Complete 3 workouts with 100% execution.
Complete 5 workouts with 100% execution.
Complete 10 workouts with 100% execution.
Complete 3 workouts with 100% execution and 5 with 80% execution.
Train with a friend at least once a week.
Join a group workout with 5 friends.
Train with 3 friends at least twice a week.
Invite a friend to train together 3 times this week.
Create your own routine with 4 different exercises and share it.
Try 3 new exercises never done before and share a photo.
Complete all weekly goals for the month.
5 consecutive workouts with 100% execution.
Help a beginner complete their first week; both earn points.
Post a useful tip that helps others.
Suggest a new rule or dynamic for the week's workouts.
Propose a public challenge for others to join.
Beat your personal record in 3 different exercises.
Reach advanced level in any workout category.
Complete a progressive challenge: increase workout intensity by 10% each session for 7 sessions.
Master all exercise variations in a specific workout category.
Complete a workout with a friend and both achieve 100% execution.
